strIntroduction: 和另一半來場下龍灣的甜蜜浪漫之旅吧！美麗的下龍灣是遠古時期的自然奇觀，根據越南的神話傳說，很久以前，有一條母龍降落在這個海灣，擋住了洶湧的波濤，使這一帶人民安居樂業，因此人們便把這個海灣稱為“下龍灣”。下龍灣有「海上桂林」之稱，聯合國教科文組織於1994年將下龍灣列入世界文化遺產
strTitle: Halong Bay 4-Star Huong Hai Sealife Cruise 2D1N

strIntroduction: Travel to the local town and explore the nature park. See the pristine Sapa within the 2D1N Sapa Tour.

strIntroduction: Ho Chi Minh City is also known as Saigon. It was once considered as the Pearl of the Far East and now it is the modern metropolis with more than 8 billion inhabitants. strIntroduction: Enjoy a secluded Bedugul mountain tri!. Visit Bali's Tanah Lot Temple and Bedugul, shop for the local delicious fruit and herb spices. Then, visit the Pura Taman Ayun Temple, which is a quaint royal private temple. Afterwards, have fun shopping at Ubud Market for authentic handicrafts and colorful clothing fabric – experience different Bali customs all in one day.
